name: manager-server
description: Manager Server for the Raincrow Pantheon

scripts.start: INSTANCE_ID=$(curl -s 'http://metadata.google.internal/computeMetadata/v1/instance/id' -H 'Metadata-Flavor: Google') INSTANCE_REGION=$(curl -s 'http://metadata.google.internal/computeMetadata/v1/instance/zone' -H 'Metadata-Flavor: Google') NODE_ENV=$(curl -s 'http://metadata.google.internal/computeMetadata/v1/instance/attributes/env' -H 'Metadata-Flavor: Google') node server.js
scripts.local: cross-env INSTANCE_ID=local INSTANCE_REGION=local NODE_ENV=development nodemon --trace-warnings server.js

author: Sean Landis
